CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISBLANK(End_Date_of_Engagement__c), ISBLANK(Start_Date_of_Engagement__c) ), 0,
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( End_Date_of_Engagement__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( End_Date_of_Engagement__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Start_Date_of_Engagement__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Start_Date_of_Engagement__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
+ 1
)
CustomField.label: Number of Weekdays
